The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 October is 3,528 (408.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 September, there were 145 new confirmed cases (16.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 September, there were 112 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 29% (33 extra cases).
